page.title: 17RECREATION
page.content: The tennis courts, bowling green, football pitch and children's playground are often in use. {Fishing}takes place on the river Earn and recently Sandyknowes Loch which covers eight acres and is 6-8 feet deep has been opened for fly fishing. The loch is stocked with Rainbow Trout. Grass Carp were put in to clear the weeds - the first time this idea had been used in Scotland. The 'bag' limit is 4 fish per session - every catch must be registered.Price Â£5.75 adult: Â£3.45 under 15 years. 3 sessions a day. Season from 15 March - 30 October. There is a car park, cafe (open from 10 am to 10 pm) and a picnic area will open soon. Loch rented from Earl of Moncreiffe's estate.
